entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
